info.name: extratorrent - dark
info.additionalInfo:
works pretty good, some element targeting could be improved. i made this while running ublock origin, i suggest you run it also whether you use this style or not.

v0.9: added more urls to target

v0.8: made the style easily customizable with css variables at the top, added light theme as a test

v0.7: tweaked drop down menus and fixed uploader hover info box

v0.6: minor fixes, mostly to the download page

v0.5: updated and improved targetting

v0.4: think i got the rest of the ads, but i can't block pop ups with css, use an adblocker

v0.3: many minor cosmetic fixes

v0.2: fixed categories
